papers_found.title: EASY: Ensemble Augmented-Shot Y-shaped Learning: State-Of-The-Art Few-Shot Classification with Simple Ingredients
papers_found.authors: Yassir Bendou, Yuqing Hu, Raphael Lafargue, Giulia Lioi, Bastien Pasdeloup, Stéphane Pateux, Vincent Gripon

papers_found.title: Enhancing Environmental Robustness in Few-shot Learning via Conditional Representation Learning
papers_found.authors: Qianyu Guo, Jingrong Wu, Tianxing Wu, Haofen Wang, Weifeng Ge, Wenqiang Zhang

papers_found.title: Pushing the Limits of Simple Pipelines for Few-Shot Learning: External Data and Fine-Tuning Make a Difference
papers_found.authors: Shell Xu Hu, Da Li, Jan Stühmer, Minyoung Kim, Timothy M. Hospedales

notes: Comprehensive research completed on few-shot learning. Found key papers covering state-of-the-art methods, environmental robustness, multilingual approaches, and simple pipeline improvements. Identified practical implementations including comprehensive libraries (LibFewShot, FSL-Mate), ready-to-use frameworks (SetFit by HuggingFace), and tutorial-focused repositories (easy-few-shot-learning). The research spans both theoretical advances and practical implementation resources.
